name: Bethesda Launcher
notes:
Included is a script named <tt>helper.sh</tt>, placed in the launcher folder, it's used to workaround an issue with installing and updating games. 

It's located in Bethesda Launcher folder <tt>$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Bethesda.Net Launcher</tt>

To use: Install your game through the launcher and wait for the error, open a terminal, <tt>cd</tt> into your Bethesda.net Launcher folder, and run <tt>./helper.sh</tt>. Install your game.

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Installing Bethesda.Net launcher, please do not sign in, the launcher will shortly close after being launched. If not, you can safely close it, and wait for the end of the installation.

content:
files:
- setup: https://download.cdp.bethesda.net/BethesdaNetLauncher_Setup.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Bethesda.net Launcher/BethesdaNetLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Bethesda.net Launcher
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2012 corefonts win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: GrabFullscreen
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: Y
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    description: Installing Bethesda.Net launcher, please do not sign in, the launcher
      will shortly close after being launched. If not, you can safely close it, and
      wait for the end of the installation.
    exclude_processes: BethesdaNetLauncher.exe
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
